title: [K-12] Business Education Design Strategies in Hybrid Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental business concepts and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen business competencies in a hybrid environment. Cultivates practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more instructional designs that promote knowledge dynamism (rational, emotional, and spiritual knowledge) in hybrid environments.
Learners can develop blended learning strategies that leverage the strengths of face-to-face (F2F) and online modes and apply them to real-life cases.
Learners can identify and utilize five or more digital resources required for designing an internationalized curriculum.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
